channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 59 Edmonton Zone 37 South Zone 16 Central Zone 14 North Zone 30 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Fri, Apr 16, 2021. AHS data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 8967 285 VOC Percentage 53.5% -0.011% Total VOC cases 14850 898 Total VOC recovered 5834 612 Total deaths from VOC 49 1 VOC specimens screened 34685 1475 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Thu, Apr 15, 2021
